feed.title: Ryohei Seto’s web site
feed.subtitle: I am working on soft-matter physics, complex fluid mechanics, and rheology as a researcher with Prof Masao Doi at Beihang University in Beijing. I have tackled various problems including shear thickening of dense suspensions and non-equilibrium dynamics in various colloidal systems.

entry.title: Generalization of material functions
entry.content: Published in Journal of Rheology (April 17, 2018) G. G. Giusteri and R. Seto. A theoretical framework for steady-state rheometry in generic flow conditions. J. Rheol., 62(3):713–723, 2018. 10.1122/1.4986840
entry.summary: Published in Journal of Rheology (April 17, 2018) G. G. Giusteri and R. Seto. A theoretical framework for steady-state rheometry in generic flow conditions. J. Rheol., 62(3):713–723, 2018. 10.1122/1.4986840

entry.title: Planar extensional flow simulation for suspensions

link.title: Planar extensional flow simulation for suspensions

entry.content:
Our paper for extensional flow simulations is featured in Focus on Fluids by Prof. Helen Wilson: ‘Shear thickening’ in non-shear flows: the effect of microstructure

The cover image of Journal of Fluid Mechanics is from our work!
entry.summary: Our paper for extensional flow simulations is featured in Focus on Fluids by Prof. Helen Wilson: ‘Shear thickening’ in non-shear flows: the effect of microstructure
